languages.text: "Зафиксировано неуважение к доктринам достопочтенных Адептус Арбитес".
"Disrespect toward the doctrine of the esteemed Adeptus Arbites has been recorded."
languages.original_text: "Зафиксировано неуважение к доктринам достопочтенных Адептус Арбитес".

traits.locale_text: "Disrespect toward the doctrine of the esteemed Adeptus Arbites has been recorded."
"Disrespect toward the doctrine of the esteemed Adeptus Arbites has been recorded."
"Contempt of court within the hallowed walls of the Palace has been recorded."
"Disrespect toward the doctrine of the esteemed Adeptus Arbites has been recorded."
"Disrespect toward the doctrine of the esteemed Adeptus Arbites has been recorded."
"Disrespect toward the doctrine of the esteemed Adeptus Arbites has been recorded."
"Disrespect toward the doctrine of the esteemed Adeptus Arbites has been recorded."

languages.text: "Missachtung der Doktrin des geschätzten Adeptus Arbites wurde vermerkt."
languages.original_text: "Disrespect toward the doctrine of the esteemed Adeptus Arbites has been recorded."

traits.locale_text: "Missachtung der Doktrin des geschätzten Adeptus Arbites wurde vermerkt."
"Missachtung des Gerichts in den heiligen Hallen des Palastes wurde vermerkt."

languages.text: « Le non-respect de la doctrine de l'estimée Adeptus Arbites est dûment enregistré. »
languages.original_text: "Disrespect toward the doctrine of the esteemed Adeptus Arbites has been recorded."

traits.locale_text: « Le non-respect de la doctrine de l'estimée Adeptus Arbites est dûment enregistré. »
« Cet outrage à la cour, commis dans l'enceinte du palais, a été consigné. »

languages.text: “被告藐视帝国法务部的神圣规定，相关内容已记录在案。”
languages.original_text: "Disrespect toward the doctrine of the esteemed Adeptus Arbites has been recorded."

traits.locale_text: “被告藐视帝国法务部的神圣规定，相关内容已记录在案。”
“被告在神圣殿堂内藐视法庭，相关内容已记录在案。”

languages.text: «Queda registrada la falta de respeto hacia la doctrina del estimado Adeptus Arbites».
languages.original_text: "Disrespect toward the doctrine of the esteemed Adeptus Arbites has been recorded."

traits.locale_text: «Queda registrada la falta de respeto hacia la doctrina del estimado Adeptus Arbites».
«Queda registrado el desacato al tribunal en las salas sagradas del Palacio».

languages.text: 「高名なる高等裁定局の方針に対する不敬が記録されました」
languages.original_text: "Disrespect toward the doctrine of the esteemed Adeptus Arbites has been recorded."

traits.locale_text: 「高名なる高等裁定局の方針に対する不敬が記録されました」
「司法宮の聖なる壁の中での法廷侮辱が記録されました」

languages.text: "Saygıdeğer Adeptus Arbites'in doktrinine karşı saygısızlık edildiği kayda geçirilmiştir."
languages.original_text: "Disrespect toward the doctrine of the esteemed Adeptus Arbites has been recorded."

traits.locale_text: "Saygıdeğer Adeptus Arbites'in doktrinine karşı saygısızlık edildiği kayda geçirilmiştir."
"Sanığın Kutsal Adalet Sarayı içinde mahkemeyi aşağılaması kayıtlara geçirilmiştir."
